price: Musa berdoa, "Ya Tuhan-ku, sesungguhnya aku telah menganiaya diriku sendiri karena itu ampunilah aku".  Maka Allah mengampuninya; sesungguhnya Allah Dia-lah Yang Maha Pengampun lagi Maha Penyayang.
arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ إِنِّي ظَلَمۡتُ نَفۡسِي فَٱغۡفِرۡ لِي فَغَفَرَ لَهُۥٓۚ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلۡغَفُورُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qāla rabbi innī ẓalamtu nafsī fa-igh'fir lī faghafara lahu innahu huwa al-ghafūru al-raḥīmu
